meanings.sent1: Her conceitedness was evident in the way she constantly talked about herself.
meanings.sent2: His conceitedness often made others feel uncomfortable around him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his conceitedness, he still had a few close friends who tolerated his behavior.
meanings.sent4: The conceitedness of the peacock as it strutted around the garden was hard to miss.
meanings.sent5: The conceitedness of the cat as it ignored everyone around it was both amusing and frustrating.

meanings.definition: The state of being vain or arrogant.
meanings.sent1: She displayed her conceitedness by constantly checking herself out in the mirror.
meanings.sent2: His conceitedness led him to believe he was better than everyone else.
meanings.sent3: The conceitedness of the squirrel as it hoarded all the nuts for itself was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The conceitedness of the storm as it raged through the night was both terrifying and awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The conceitedness of the flower as it bloomed brighter than the rest was a sight to behold.
